titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Patricia Bourne Munoz Papers, 1952-1955
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections SC 0038
titlepage.publisher: Special Collections, Carrier Library, James Madison University

did.abstract: The Patricia Bourne Munoz Papers, 1952-1955, contain two items belonging to Patricia Bourne Munoz, a 1957 Madison College graduate. Items include one program from the Madison College May Day of 1957 and one program from a 1955 Virgil Fox organ concert.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to research. Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection. Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the James Madison University Special Collections Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have been transferred to the James Madison University Special Collections Library. For more information, contact the Special Collections Library Reference Desk (library-special@jmu.edu).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [identification of item], [box #, folder #], Patricia Bourne Munoz Papers, 1952-1955, SC 0038, Special Collections, Carrier Library, James Madison University, Harrisonburg, VA.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was donated to the James Madison University Alumni Association and was subsequently transferred to the Special Collections Library.

bioghist.head: Bio/Historical Note
bioghist.p: Patricia Anne Bourne of Glen Allen, Virginia graduated from Madison College in 1957 with a bachelor's degree in education. During her college career, Bourne was a member of the Ex Libris Club (library science), the Association for Childhood Learning, the Wesley Foundation, and the Y.W.C.A.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Patricia Bourne Munoz Papers, 1952-1955, contain two items belonging to Patricia Bourne Munoz, a 1957 Madison College graduate of 1957. Items include one program from the Madison College May Day of 1957 and one program from a 1955 Virgil Fox organ concert. Both items have an adhesive return address label bearing the name "Patricia Munoz" affixed to their versos.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The items in this collection are arranged chronologically in one folder.
